findings.title: Document and Test Expected Behavior of System's Events
findings.description: Document and test the expected behavior of all of the system's events. Consider using a blockchain-monitoring system to track any suspicious behavior in the contracts.

findings.title: Undefined Behavior
findings.description: A malicious manager could borrow tokens, swap them for all the other tokens, and drain the pool.

findings.title: Access Controls
findings.description: Related to authorization of users and assessment of rights

findings.title: Data Validation
findings.description: Insufficient data validation can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security vulnerabilities.
